summary: Digital gaming account marketplace where admins manage product listings (mobile gaming accounts, in-game currency, premium clothes) through an admin panel. Buyers must create accounts via Internet Identity to purchase. Payment methods: PayPal, UK gift cards, and crypto with admin-configured payment info. Products include game name, price in GBP, images, and quantity. Multiple game categories supported.
architectural_notes: Motoko backend on Internet Computer platform
React + TypeScript frontend with Tailwind CSS
Internet Identity for secure buyer authentication
Manual payment processing with admin-configured payment instructions
Product types: gaming accounts with ranks, in-game currency, premium clothes
Username system: unique usernames required post-authentication, 5+ chars, alphanumeric only, with profanity filtering
Login queue: random countdown 20-60 for all users, auto-proceeds to username creation (new) or store (returning)
Social media links: YouTube and Instagram icons at bottom of queue and store pages
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Animated gaming background video showing dynamic gameplay footage with fast-paced action, vibrant colors, and looping seamlessly (gaming-background.mp4)
